root.name: No Second Prize
root.description: captionRealistic 3D motorcycle race game. Instead of using the joystick you have to use the mouse. The game has (for it's time) incredibly fast polygon graphics. 6 totally different racers, each with their own individual abilities and unique racing bikes. Training modes: alone on one of the tracks, one-on-one with a chosen rider, or you against all the other riders. A 20 Race Season against five other competitors, with a unique prize for winner.
